wikipedia_page.main: Francis Gerard Brooks (14 January 1924 – 4 September 2010) was the Catholic Bishop of the Diocese of Dromore, Northern Ireland.

response: *14 January – Francis Gerard Brooks, Bishop of Dromore (1976–1979; died 2010).
